reviews.review: сука,игра ебучая хуйня,на сильверах кидает к ебучим беркутам,после каждой обновы 20 фпс+ пинг по 1000 и после последнего обновления,в игре не доступен инвентарь и подбор игр

After 3000 hours playing it, I didn't improve my skills in-game, still Silver Elite Master.

However, I learned new language skills: now I can curse in Russian, Filipino, and Chinese.

Also, my tolerance level to guttural screams and loud sounds was increased.

Better than any psychiatric therapy. 10/10
ten numer jest bardzo potrzebny jesli macie zawał serca przez flasha

for the previous update i faced a fps bug which is fixed to 60 fps till date,
and there is todays update in which the game opens and now we are not connected to the internet.  
i am tired of this game dude.
